thread.section_title: The Piccadilly London West End - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Top Hotel
thread.title_full: Top Hotel - Review of The Piccadilly London West End, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: PolinaAtanasova
title: Top Hotel
text:
I stayed at this hotel with my father for 2 nights in January and we only regret we could not stay more!
I go on a Weekend trips to London whenever I can and I have some experience in different hotels at different locations which were actually not disappointing at all but this hotel became my Number 1 ! Top location , friendly staff , we got upgraded in a double room with 2 double beds and the room was so spacious and nice. We have had some difficulties with turning the warm water but nothing negative to say about this place.
